content: this fun hat is made using a simple mock cable so no cable needle needed and variable repeats coordinating mitts 1 are also free on ravelry because this is a free pattern it has not been test knitted or tech edited if you have questions or suggestions for improvement please contact me through ravelry messages i usually respond within 1 day danish translation is available here 2 many thanks to marianneho 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/urchin-mitts 2 https //strikkeglad dk/57446/hue-med-falske-snoninger-2/
